featured.text: Given this powerful effect, parents who are trying to lose weight should be careful of how their dieting habits can influence a child’s perceptions about food and healthful eating.

definition.zh_def: 感知；對事物的理解或看法
definition.en_def: The ability to see, hear, or become aware of something through the senses; the way in which something is regarded, understood, or interpreted.
definition.example: Her perception of the situation changed after she heard both sides of the story.
